data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barão, Kim Ribeiro, Garbelotto, Thereza De Almeida, Campos, Luiz Alexandre, Grazia, Jocelia (2016): Unusual looking pentatomids: reassessing the taxonomy of Braunus Distant and Lojus McDonald (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae). Zootaxa 4078 (1): 168-186, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4078.1.16
